name: Vs. Ron (Cool Mod) FNF
description:
We are almost done with the charting for the second version, and there will be at least four songs for the second version, I'll list them here:
Trojan Virus
File Manipulation
Atelophobia
Oneirophobia
The last song, Oneirophobia, will have the same charts globally just like tutorial, so get ready to mash away at keys no matter the difficulty!
We're also planning to add in different things such as:
Languages - (spanish, pt-br, french, german)
Remastered Dialogues and Spritesheets for Ron
Bob :)
Recharting (not for bloodshed and tutorial ;D)
And we're planning these following things:
A sequel to VS Ron
Possible mod collabs with popular devs
A spin-off platformer
